ml

Class FeatureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.FeatureManager

  • public class FeatureManager
extends Object
    A helper class to manage a list of features and to turn them into a list of strings required for maximum entropy modeling.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FeatureManager()
      Creates a new feature manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(ml.IndicatorFeature feature)
      Adds a feature to the feature manager.
      void addAllPairs(List<ml.IndicatorFeature> featureList)
      Adds to this feature manager all pairwise combinations of features contained within the given list.
      void addAllTriplets(List<ml.IndicatorFeature> featureList)
      Adds to this feature manager all triple combinations of features contained within the given list.
      void addAllUnaries(List<ml.IndicatorFeature> featureList)
      Adds to this feature manager all features contained within the given list.
      List<String> toContext()
      Turns the list of IndicatorFeatures stored by this feature manager into a list of strings using their IndicatorFeature.toContext() methods.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • FeatureManager

        public FeatureManager()
        Creates a new feature manager.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(ml.IndicatorFeature feature)
        Adds a feature to the feature manager.
        Parameters:
        feature - the feature to add

      • toContext

        public List<String> toContext()
        Turns the list of IndicatorFeatures stored by this feature manager into a list of strings using their IndicatorFeature.toContext() methods.
        Returns:
        the list of strings extracted from the features of this feature manager

      • addAllUnaries

        public void addAllUnaries(List<ml.IndicatorFeature> featureList)
        Adds to this feature manager all features contained within the given list.
        Parameters:
        featureList - the list of features

        Adds to this feature manager all pairwise combinations of features contained within the given list.
        Parameters:
        featureList - the list of features

        public void addAllTriplets(List<ml.IndicatorFeature> featureList)

        Parameters:
